title: Palak Paneer
description: A creamy spinach curry cooked with soft paneer cubes and aromatic spices.
instructions: Blanch the spinach by boiling it for 2 minutes, then immediately transferring it to ice water to keep the color vibrant.
Blend the spinach and green chili into a smooth puree and set aside.
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds. Once they sizzle, add chopped onions.
Cook the onions until golden, then add ginger-garlic paste and saut√© for 1 minute.
Pour in the spinach puree and cook for 5 minutes on medium heat to thicken the sauce.
Add paneer cubes and gently stir so they absorb the spinach flavors.
Finish by adding cream, salt, and simmering for another 3 minutes.
